name: places/ChIJLcrqPD32wokRr6d8ezE9_sg
formattedAddress: 808 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 808 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: If you want your clothes ruined and to be charged extra for it, this is the perfect place. “$25-$35 by Friday.” Turned into a ruined suit jacket that cost me $50 and was delivered a week late after I pestered them. Won’t go back and if you want to save yourself a headache and some money, you shouldn’t either.

text.text: If you want your clothes ruined and to be charged extra for it, this is the perfect place. “$25-$35 by Friday.” Turned into a ruined suit jacket that cost me $50 and was delivered a week late after I pestered them. Won’t go back and if you want to save yourself a headache and some money, you shouldn’t either.

originalText.text: I have given this business about $500/month in dry cleaning for several months; this bad decision on my part is now over. First they lost a sweater and accepted no responsibility for the item; said they never had it in the first place. Now, instead of dry cleaning a beautiful wool jacket, they washed it  in the washing machine, sending it back to me in doll-size with no phone call or acknowledgement. The work is not done on site and I believe there must be a central place full of untrained and uncaring workers; the folks in the shop are happy to create cover stories but no service improvement is possible when no one cares about anything but lying to cover mistakes. If there were a minus 5 stars, this would be the appropriate rating.

originalText.text: I dropped some tuxedo pants off to get hemmed before a wedding. Turnaround was 3 days, they may have been able to do rush service but I didn't ask. Price was $15 which is pretty typical for the area. The hemming job looked great and I was very happy with the service.

text.text: I dropped some tuxedo pants off to get hemmed before a wedding. Turnaround was 3 days, they may have been able to do rush service but I didn't ask. Price was $15 which is pretty typical for the area. The hemming job looked great and I was very happy with the service.

originalText.text:
Don't expect your clothes the next day if there are any stains - the next day service is apparently only for clean clothes that require dry cleaning - absurd!

This fact is not disclosed anywhere on the website, nor was it disclosed when I called to verify terms of next day service.

Need something tailored? Don't bother. The tailor (or at least someone to pin the garment) is only available on Thursdays. Again, not disclosed as advertised.

Want to be insulted? This is the place to go! I wanted a uniform vest taken in for fit only - appearance was not important as the back of the vest would never be visible. Even though the tailor was not there, I showed the man at the desk what I wanted - had pinned it myself. He told me flat out that they don't do "Chinese" work with an arrogant hand gesture.

Excuse me, but the day I pay $60 for a 'maestro' working out of a dry cleaners to alter a uniform piece is the day I invest that toward having a bespoke piece made by a proper tailor.

I will never take my business here again.

originalText.text: I have a long winter coat and the zipper was damaged. I was actually stepping into my coat to wear it.  Found NEXT and they fixed it with no problem. Am eternally grateful.
